mapper.select: select reviewNum, memberId, shopNum, reviewComment, reviewDepth, reviewGroup, memberName, reviewDate, shopName from review join (select memberName,memberId, shopNum, shopName from memberList join shopInfo using (memberId) where shopNum=#{shopNum}) using(memberId, shopNum) where reviewDepth=1
select sum(reviewScore)/count(reviewScore) scoreAvg from review where shopNum=#{shopNum}
select count(*) from review where rsvnNum=#{rsvnNum} and (select bookingDate from reservation where rsvnNum=#{rsvnNum} and rsvnstatus=0) < sysdate
mapper.insert: insert into (reviewNum, memberId, shopNum, rsvnNum, reviewScore, reviewCommemt, reviewDepth, reviewGroup) values (#{reviewNum},#{memberId},#{shopNum}, #{rsvnNum},#{reviewScore},#{reviewCommemt},#{reviewDepth},#{reviewGroup})
